intro: Epithema tenue, commonly known as the slender epithema, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks. Epithema tenue is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
